name: Gezina
overview: Gezina AS is a private equity investor with a long track record in creating superior returns through active ownership in public and private companies. Gezina AS is controlled by Mr. Tharald BrÃ¸vig. The name of the company originates from the more than 100 year old shipping activities. The company is domiciled in Oslo with offices in Oslo and Farsund. Gezina is engaged in shipping business and has 2 Chemical/Product Carriers which was taken delivery of in 2005 and 2006. The company has 5 similar vessels under construcion which will be delivered in 2007. The main focus is on investments in the fields of high technology, biotech and pharmaceuticals as well as the service sector where traditional monopolies can be challenged. The investment cycle is typically from late venture through IPOâ€™s resulting in long-term, active ownerships in public quoted companies. Almost all investments aim at global markets even though the technology or service concept may originate from one country or region.

funding_round.source_description: SantoSolve Raises USD 7 Million to Support Transition of Promising Pain Reliever 2PX into Phase III Clinical Trial
